SysFileCopy (FUN)
SysFileCopy (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileCopy : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Copy one file to another.
A standard path will be added to the filename, if no path is specified.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileCopy
RTS_IEC_RESULT
The runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)
Input
szDestFileName
STRING
Destination file name. File name can contain an absolute or relative path to the file.
Path entries must be separated with a Slash (/)  and not with a Backslash (\)!
szSourceFileName
STRING
Source file name. File name can contain an absolute or relative path to the file.
Path entries must be separated with a Slash (/)  and not with a Backslash (\)!
pulCopied
POINTER TO __XWORD
Number of bytes copied
top
